name: Shadow (itch) (Austin's Games)
description: In this game designed for a class assignment, you play as the ghostly echo of a violent death.  At this stage the game is a very rough prototype.  While not containing any final art, the games visual style has developed, and some basic systems, like artificial intelligence, stealth, and one of the powers (press X on your keyboard and walk into a fence), have been implemented but are not polished.  I'm not sure if I'll continue working on the game, but the art direction I'll certainly carry forward somewhere.
